description: [``botocore``] This feature introduces the API support for Athena's parameterized query and BatchGetPreparedStatement API.

[``botocore``] This release adds the optional MinAllowedConfidenceScoreForMerging parameter to the CreateDomain, UpdateDomain, and GetAutoMergingPreview APIs in Customer Profiles. This parameter is used as a threshold to influence the profile auto-merging step of the Identity Resolution process.
[``botocore``] Update emr client to latest version
[``botocore``] This release adds tag as an input of CreateDatabase
[``botocore``] Amazon Kendra now provides a data source connector for alfresco
[``botocore``] Documentation updates for Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow.
[``botocore``] Added support for UpdateGlobalSettings API. Added status filter to ListWorkloadShares and ListLensShares.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for managing user availability configurations in Amazon WorkMail.
